name: Arowell
description: A bodyguard who will protect her lady at any cost
story: Doris Rutton's personal bodyguard, Arowell often comes off as stiff due to her serious personality. She is willing to follow Doris anywhere, and will protect her at any cost.

relations.description: Arowell's precious master, who she would lay down her life to protect.
Sven was responsible for saving Arowell's life in the past. She wishes to meet him again and repay the favor.
Arowell can't help but be nervous about how much time Judith spends around Doris, who she has sworn to protect.

specialty.name: It's Basic
specialty.description: In order to defend your client, some basic hunting is required.

costs.name: Reingar Student ID
costs.description: The personal information on this student ID was erased before it was discarded. It emits the endless desire for knowledge.

skills.name: Shield Thrust
skills.description: Attacks with a sword and shield, with a {{variable}} chance to dispel two buffs. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Escort
skills.description: Grants a barrier to the ally with the lowest Health for 2 turns at the start of battle and at the start of the caster's turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

skills.name: Defensive Position
skills.description: Attacks the enemy, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
skills.enhanced_description: Attacks with a sword, with a {{variable}} chance to stun for 1 turn and decreases Combat Readiness by 30%. Combat Readiness reduction effect ignores Effect Resistance. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

buffs.name: Barrier
buffs.effect: Neutralizes some of the damage taken when attacked.

debuffs.name: Stun
debuffs.effect: The target becomes unable to act for a certain number of turns.

skill1.name: 盾突
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、50.0%％の確率で強化効果を2つ解除する。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。

skill2.name: 護衛
skill2.desc: バトル開始時・自身のターン開始時、生命力状態が最も悪い味方にシールドを2ターンの間付与する。自身の最大生命力が高いほどシールド効果がUPする。

skill3.name: 防御態勢
skill3.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、75.0%の確率でスタンを1ターンの間付与する。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。
skill3.soul_description: 敵単体に攻撃し、75.0%の確率でスタンを1ターンの間付与する。自身の最大生命力が高いほどダメージがUPする。
